snippet.description: ...Anyone who's played an MMO can testify to the fact that grinding for gold and loot is a hassle that most would rather avoid. snippet.title: Ubisoft and Gold's Gym creating game together
snippet.description: ...Nintendo's winning formula that is Wii Fit has proven to be such a huge success that everyone is trying to get a piece of the pie that is fitness video gaming, often with less-than-amazing titles. Ubisoft has revealed that it's hoping to get in on the action by teaming up with fitness chain Gold's Gym. Gold's Gym: Cardio Workout will unsurprisingly use the Wii Fit balance boar...

snippet.title: Sony drops price on the wrong PlayStation
snippet.description: ...While the buzz at GDC was about a possible price break on the PlayStation 3, today all the rumors about a Sony price drop have been confirmed... for the PlayStation 2. Starting April 1, new PS2 hardware will cost $99.99, coming in below the magical $100 price point. Compared to $400 for the PS3...
